title: Canadian 'Freedom Convoy' Part 2: Border Blockades & Political Ramifications
itunes:title: Canadian 'Freedom Convoy' Part 2: Border Blockades & Political Ramifications
description:
As the Convoy occupation expanded beyond choking a single major city, the blocking of supply lines and border crossings raised more questions regarding how the government's reaction might effect political movements in the future.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
